content: Down will drop a Puppet Spider, a Yaoguai that likes to ambush and stab at you with its many legs. Luckily, you'll have Zhu Bajie on your side once more, and overwhelming lone opponents will be an easy task. They can spew poison from a distance, so watch yourself that you don't have to waste any Antimiasma potions this early.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Village_of_Lanxi_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Village of Lanxi Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'The Webbed Hollow'.
The content is as follows:
Down will drop a Puppet Spider, a Yaoguai that likes to ambush and stab at you with its many legs. Luckily, you'll have Zhu Bajie on your side once more, and overwhelming lone opponents will be an easy task. They can spew poison from a distance, so watch yourself that you don't have to waste any Antimiasma potions this early.
